description.value:
Inflicts horrific pain via shocking the nervous system of those it is implanted into. Used to enforce compliance on particularly valued or resilient slaves.

Requirements

One step easier to obtain if offered by a stryxis merchant. Xenotech.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
